name: Labrinthia
description:
An extremely simple game that I made in two days!

It is not fully finished I plan on adding some extra stuff to make it more enjoyable.
As for now please enjoy it in it's current state :)

The mazes are randomly generated off a seed meaning that the first maze will always be the same however I have no clue what maze 256 looks like.

Controls:
[f4] - Toggle fullscreen.
[f3] - Change window size.
Arrow keys - Move the ball.

Music - Wirelex.exe
Sfx - Astrodex
